product_name: Blind Barber80 Proof Texturizing Style Powder
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackBlind Barber's 80 Proof Texturizing Style Powder provides weightless volume and texture as well as a medium to strong hold that can be restyled throughout the day.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsHopsFormulated WithoutSulfatesParabensFragrance FamilyTonka BeanItem 2621198How To UseSimply tap gently or apply a few shakes onto the hair, work into the roots until all of the powder disappears and watch as our unique 80 Proof Texturizing Style Powder transforms into your favorite matte finish styling product with lasting hold for all hair types.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Silica, Maranta Arundinacea Root Extract, Silica Silylate, Propanediol, Nylon-12, Hydroxyacetophenone, VP/VA Copolymer, Kaolin, Glycerin, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Humulus Lupulus (Hops) ExtractCalifornia Prop65 WarningWARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals which are known to the state of California to cause cancerLearn more at www.P65Warnings.ca.gov
how_to_use: Simply tap gently or apply a few shakes onto the hair, work into the roots until all of the powder disappears and watch as our unique 80 Proof Texturizing Style Powder transforms into your favorite matte finish styling product with lasting hold for all hair types.

reviews.headline: Good product, bad packaging
reviews.comments: Works well, but will leave a white layer in darker hair. The packaging is awful. The lid is very hard to screw on and off and will result in some spilled product. Makes it very annoying to use

reviews.headline: Disappointing
reviews.comments: I purchased this based on the stellar reviews as I was looking for a powder to add some volume to my roots. when I received my order, the container was leaking powder, and when I opened it, a good amount of the product spilled out of the cap. For this price, it should be packaged more securely. The product that got on my hands was sticky and tacky, and I'm not sure that it wouldn't have made my hair clumpy. It's being returned.

reviews.headline: Excellent
reviews.comments: Excellent product.  And work very good on my hair.give a nice textured thick look to my hair. Super amazing results and everyone loved the new look .ulta always got very good product. And this one is also a clear winner as well. Buy it u wont b disappointed

reviews.headline: I'll definitely buy again
reviews.comments: Lasts through the whole day and keeps a nice hold on your hairstyle no wind could stop me lol

reviews.headline: WOW !
reviews.comments:
Unexpected winner in my order!   I would have never found this product, because I think this is a men's line, however, I saw it during the 21 days of beauty and found it interesting a powder can provide medium hold, so I had to try it.  Blown away by how well this product performs.   

My hair is super fine like baby hair and I have tried all types of volumizers and dry shampoos and tapioca starch in the past.  Those other products were drying, left my hair stiff or feeling dirty, or only held for 10 minutes at most.   This product is so lightweight and somehow sticks to yr hair, yet you don't feel you have any product in your hair and it provided me with the fullness I wanted.   After half an hour, it came down some, but I just refluffed and it stayed.  It will definitely be included in my arsenal of products.   Is a little pricey for such a small small bottle, however, I do think it's worth it to have around for those days your hair needs a boost.

Let's not let the men have all the fun with this product, so hoping they market to women as well.
